Name: Bob Hearts Abishola
Title: The Devil's Taste Buds
Desc: While Dele is in Nigeria with his dad, Abishola struggles with how to handle her free time.
LongDescription: While Dele is in Nigeria with his dad, Abishola struggles with how to handle her free time; Dottie enlists Christina's help at her old house; Olu and Tunde try to keep up with their new Nigerian houseguest.
